modName: Conjure a Small Army of Corrupted Shades - Soldiers and Archers
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][u]WARNING: [/u]This mod will not work properly without the given mod it prompts to you before you download it. You will only be able to conjure 2 shades instead of 4.[/size]


[size=5]ABOUT[/size]

Conjure four Corrupted's to fight at your side.
3 Corrupted Soldiers / Shades- Daedric Swords along with the Summon two Skeletons for 2 minutes spell
1 Corrupted Archer - Daedric Bow with Glass Arrows

[u][size=5]Version History[/size]

[/u]1.0: Initial release
author: Vamure
